content: {玩家转向Actor0}I just made the roundest fluff ball ever in history, baa~ {A疑惑}Meh meh? What are you up to, Msafiri?

content: {A豆豆眼}Medowlyn, your target seems to be... {短暂停} quite a handful...
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: {A疑惑}Target? You mean... the yarn ball I just made, baa?{短暂停} So it's not that round or perfect, baa...
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: {A心虚目移}Seeing how perfect your yarn ball is, I thought... Ahem, anyway. We were thinking about practicing hunting together, yes?
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: {A笑眯眯}Ah, that's not it baa. I made the yarn ball to get some inspiration, and you looked so excited with it, I thought it gave you a great idea!
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: An idea... {A灵光一现}Well, I actually do have one! Let's chase down all the yarn balls in sight. Ahem, I mean, all our target prey. That settles it, kula bata!
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: {A歪头}Baa-hm? Speaking of prey... I know about seventeen or eighteen super-secret spots where they're all hiding...!
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: In that case, {A看我的}you can trust me with all your clues. Once I map out our adventure route, it's time for the Yarn Ball Squad to roll out!
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: Yarn Ball travel journal, lead the way!
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: Got yourself a free yarn winder now, huh?
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: There are two yarn balls right in front of me!
info: 日常对话-小剧场-绵朵莉&萨飞里_小剧场

content: {A两眼放光}Naturally! Today's adventure goal is... digging out every last one of those yarn balls! Happy hunting, kula bata!

content: {A两眼放光}Baa-mm? H-How did you know what I was thinking...?
